description: Use the ARK Mainnet and Devnet Explorers directly within the Pavyo wallet
readme:
# ARK Explorer

> Use the ARK Mainnet and Devnet Explorers directly within the Pavyo wallet

## Installation

Install this plugin directly through the Plugin Manager of ARKVault. Alternatively you can clone this repository and copy the `ark-explorer` folder into `~/.arkvault/plugins/`.

## Credits

-   [Lúcio Rubens](https://github.com/luciorubeens)
-   [All Contributors](../../contributors)
